plot: A corporate executive is taken prisoner by an underground organization known as The Movement, and is turned over to a ruthless interrogator.
title: 984: Prisoner of the Future
plot_es: A corporate executive is taken prisoner by an underground organization known as The Movement, and is turned over to a ruthless interrogator.
plot_en: A corporate executive is taken prisoner by an underground organization known as The Movement, and is turned over to a ruthless interrogator.
